about_the_game:
Get ready for an all-new take on the classic original Cook, Serve, Delicious! game!

For the ten-year anniversary, we wanted to return to the game that started it all. Cook, Serve, Delicious: Re-Mustard! adds a whole new refreshed campaign as you start from your zero-star restaurant to a five-star world-class establishment! This brand-new game includes:

  • An all-new campaign that includes brand new emails and story elements to tie it into the events of Cook, Serve, Delicious! 2!! and Cook, Serve, Delicious! 3?!
  • A new optional Typing Mode tests your typing skills as you flex your IPMs—Ingredients Per Minute—typing out each ingredient in this frantic new way to play CSD!
  • Re-balanced difficulties ranging from Chill to Extreme!
  • All new art and expanded music by the original composer, Jonathan Geer
  • All 30 classic foods return with new recipes and ingredients, plus ten brand-new foods.
  • Classic local co-op Chef/Expediter mode and a new split-screen mode
  • New campaign side quests and surprises!
  • Brand new 60fps code base
